attributes.action: That all government ministers should be open and honest regarding their financial interests outside of parliaiment
attributes.additional_details:
All government ministers and advisors must be honest and inform the public of any financial interests they hold outside of parliaiment .
Should they be untruthful or withold any information of that kind,they should immediately be de selected and face criminal charges regardless of how many friends they have in government.
We the public,who pay them to hold office,not power,demand more transparency and honesty.
